name: Celestial Crowns
storyline: Set in a world where they worship the stars, play as the newly crowned Ruling Monarch of the kingdom of Lauté. In ancient times, the Royals were masters of the elements with the ability to spellcraft that made people believe they were gods. Nowadays, the ability has faded with misuse, and the only Royal left known to have this ability is King Aalam of Andromeda. With your kingdom on unsteady ground after your father's recent assassination, this dangerous King with magic beyond comprehension has an offer you can’t ignore: Accept his hand in marriage, or go to war.
summary: The King is dead! Take the throne in this choice-rich fantasy game and save your Kingdom by reviving ancient magic that's been lost to your family for generations. Customize your character and play through three different romantic routes!
